metadata.synopsis: Drider sees any of the tollhouse collector booster NPCs in combat while traversing the tollhouse in TWN.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Start the encounter and move anyone from the tollhouse collector booster to the lower floor near the Drider's path. Trigger the escort and follow the drider.

0.speaker: Kar'niss
0.text: Pay no heed - onwards, to Moonrise!
